name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pixel Lofi City Live Wallpaper New Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Escape to a peaceful pixelated cityscape with a chill lofi vibe in this unique live wallpaper for your Chrome tab. 🌆🎧🌙

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Immerse yourself in the calm ambiance of a pixel art city at night, complete with lofi vibes and a dreamy atmosphere. Ideal for fans of lofi music, pixel art, and cozy aesthetics, this live wallpaper transforms each new tab into a relaxing urban retreat. Whether you’re studying, working, or simply unwinding, this scene brings a serene city night to your browser.

Key Features
🖼️ Live Pixel Wallpaper: A tranquil lofi cityscape set in nostalgic pixel art style.
🔗 Customizable Site Shortcuts: Access your favorite sites with editable shortcuts.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Quickly search the web with a seamless, built-in search bar.
🕒 Clock & Date Display: Minimalistic clock and date to keep you on schedule without breaking the lofi vibe.
🔗 Quick Access Links: Easily locate “Remove Extension” and “More Extensions” options in the lower left corner.
Bring a touch of calm to every tab with this lofi-inspired cityscape. The extension blends pixel art with essential tools, creating a cozy digital space you’ll love returning to.
